eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A PRACTICE/DEMO WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Franklin, OH; AT 06:27 AM ON OCT 01, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:27 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Test Ohio EMA: Prolonged power outages expected across Meigs County. Heat index up to 115 F for several days poses serious health risks, especially for vulnerable populations. Cooling centers open 24/7 at all Meigs Local Schools. Limit travel. More: www.meigscountyema.org No action is needed. This is only a test.
